mapper.sql: id, owner, name, website, phone, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, contact_summary, next_contact_time, description, address
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_customer
id,
owner,
name,
website,
phone,
createBy,
createTime,
editBy,
editTime,
contactSummary,
nextContactTime,
description,
address,

#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update tbl_customer
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR},
editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR},
contactSummary = #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nextContactTime = #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_customer set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, contactSummary = #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nextContactTime = #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer (id, owner, name, website, phone, create_by, create_time, contact_summary,next_contact_time, description, address) values (#{id},#{ owner},#{ name},#{ website},#{ phone},#{ createBy},#{ createTime},#{ contactSummary},#{nextContactTime},#{ description},#{ address})
mapper.select:
select c.id,u1.name as owner,c.name,c.website,c.phone,u2.name as create_by,c.create_time,u3.name as edit_by,c.edit_time,c.contact_summary, c.next_contact_time,c.description,c.address from tbl_customer c join tbl_user u1 on c.owner=u1.id join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by=u3.id
and c.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and u1.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and c.website like '%' #{website} '%'
order by c.create_time desc limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from tbl_customer c join tbl_user u1 on c.owner=u1.id join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by=u3.id
and c.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and u1.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and c.phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
and c.website like '%' #{website} '%'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer (id, owner, name, website, phone, create_by, create_time, contact_summary, next_contact_time, description, address) values (#{id},#{owner},#{name},#{website},#{phone},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime},#{description},#{address})
mapper.select: select id,name from tbl_customer where name like '%' #{name} '%'

select name from tbl_customer
and name like '%' #{customerName} '%'
order by create_time asc
